thread.title: BRIEF-Shenzhen Ideal Jewellery signs cooperation agreement with tech firm on block chain technology projects

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Shenzhen Ideal Jewellery signs cooperation agreement with tech firm on block chain technology projects

organizations.name: reuters) - shenzhen ideal jewellery co ltd

text:
Feb 12 (Reuters) - Shenzhen Ideal Jewellery Co Ltd
* Says it signed cooperation agreement with Guizhou-based tech firm
* Says two entities will mainly cooperate on construction of block chain technology related joint research center and jewelry products traceability system
Source text in Chinese: goo.gl/EYqMaL
Further company coverage: (Beijing Headline News)
